channel.title: Team recruitment
channel.description:
_______________________________________________________________________________________________________________ ? I have decided to look for more staff for my server, (WHICH DOESNT HAVE A NAME YET) _______________________________________________________________________________________________________________ Table Of Contents
Forum Administrator Position Server Hoster Position Associate Coder
_______________________________________________________________________________________________________________
Forum Administrator Position
? Will you be a active member on my forums, inform someone if they are breaking rules, Post frequently, And be a model for the other players to follow? -
? What experience do you have, having a Administrator Position on other forums? (Provide Link of Forums, and Your username if you can) -
? Will you advertise our forums, and bring more people into our community? -
_______________________________________________________________________________________________________________
Server Hoster Position
? Will you keep the server online for 4 hours a day or more? -
? Will you set a prime example for the other players, and tell them if they are doing something wrong? -
? What experience do you have as being a Server Hoster?
_______________________________________________________________________________________________________________
Associate Coder
? Do you have any experience with coding? (If so tell us what kind) -
? What will you do to be a good coder for the server
_______________________________________________________________________________________________________________
Credits
90% me and Knight 10% for thinking making this format
_______________________________________________________________________________________________________________
- Forum Administrators Accepted -
moerin
- Associate Coders Accepted -
- Server Hosters Accepted -
- forum maker associates -
